head.title: A Coconut Cake Tall Enough For 20

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Hospitality, Restaurant and Travel

hedline.hl1: A Coconut Cake Tall Enough For 20

block.p: A TALL coconut cake showered with shavings of fresh coconut is a moist, sumptuous and irresistible showpiece that could make 20 or so guests happy at a wedding or other summer festivity. The $40 cake is a specialty of the Louisiana Community Bar and Grill, 622 Broadway (near Bleecker Street), and can be ordered in advance to go. For information: (212) 460-9633.
